description: Try our easy to follow Champagne Cherry Mimosa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Champagne Cherry Mimosa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place glasses in fridge to chill. When ready to serve, strain cherry mixture. Spoon a little into each chilled glass and top with sparkling wine. Garnish with an extra cherry.
Place glasses in fridge to chill. When ready to serve, strain cherry mixture. Spoon a little into each chilled glass and top with sparkling wine. Garnish with an extra cherry.
